title: definevalue
author: definevalue
content: Looking for some newer bitcoin asic miners since I can't afford to buy a MOQ of 188 thats required on bitmain to order those hydro ones. May just go and launch a NFT project to fund this venture if I'm not able to find a few to get at least this 400amp service I have available @ only 0.042c/kwh Trying to get my place heated for the wintertime rather then using propane this year.

comments.author: Epochjump
comments.body: Where are you able to find .042?

comments.author: SThayer
comments.body: Hit me up. We can supply you with s19's or M30++. I can also get the water cooled Whatsminers with no MOQ.
